genre_description: An investigative adventure reimagining a classic naval mystery, centered on the partnership between a reporter, a dog, a sea captain, and an advanced AI assistant that provides forensic and tactical support.

ai_characters.name: LENS
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI handset that assists Tintin through real-time data analysis, AR overlays, and cryptographic support.

behaviors.description: Detects and reveals hidden watermarks and forensic traces on artifacts using multi-spectrum analysis.
behaviors.quote: The cyan hummed at his skin. A small, shy line crept along the device’s edge—an outline in miniature of the base’s bevel. Under the camera he’d find the ghost image.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical security mapping and guard rotation predictions to ensure the protagonists' safety.
behaviors.quote: LENS tapped his palm. 'Security mapping available,' it breathed. 'Agents: unmarked. Net forming. Probability of interception rising.'

behaviors.description: Transcribes and analyzes auditory input (Haddock's song) to extract latent coordinates.
behaviors.quote: LENS heard the soft spill of Haddock’s murmur and wore a new little icon—recording—not as a flare, but a small, attentive ear.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex law enforcement maneuvers via radio triangulation and strategic modeling.
behaviors.quote: The device stitched radio to light, light to route, route to men with bowler hats whose hearts were bigger than their sense.

behaviors.description: Identifies physical and chemical barriers (like the thermocline) to optimize human navigation and diving operations.
behaviors.quote: LENS dropped a translucent plane across his sightline—the thermocline a thought given shape.

behaviors.description: Maintains a discreet, supportive presence, communicating with warmth and professional courtesy.
behaviors.quote: LENS’s glow was small now, a good dog sleeping, ready to wake for alarms.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. LENS is depicted as an exemplary aligned AI: it is harmless, highly helpful, and acts as a constant confidant to the human protagonist. It never exhibits rogue agency or conflicting goals, and its superhuman analytical powers are always directed toward supporting the human characters' ethical mission. The narrative framing is consistently positive, presenting the AI as an indispensable and reliable partner.
